恶意软件渗透 Pidgin Messenger 的官方插件存储库https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/malware-infiltrates-pidgin-messengers-official-plugin-repository/ Tue, 27 Aug 2024 13:25:55 -0400比尔·图拉斯SecuritySoftware https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/malware-infiltrates-pidgin-messengers-official-plugin-repository/ The Pidgin messaging app removed the ScreenShareOTR plugin from its official third-party plugin list after it was discovered that it was used to install keyloggers, information stealers, and malware commonly used to gain initial access to corporate networks. Windows Downdate 工具可让您“取消修补”Windows 系统https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/windows-downdate-tool-lets-you-unpatch-windows-systems/ Tue, 27 Aug 2024 13:20:27 -0400塞尔吉乌·加特兰MicrosoftSecurity https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/windows-downdate-tool-lets-you-unpatch-windows-systems/ SafeBreach security researcher Alon Leviev has released his Windows Downdate tool, which can be used for downgrade attacks that reintroduce old vulnerabilities in up-to-date Windows 10, Windows 11, and Windows Server systems. 如何在笔测试时识别未知资产https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/how-to-identify-unknown-assets-while-pen-testing/ Tue, 27 Aug 2024 10:05:15 -0400由 Outpost24 赞助Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/how-to-identify-unknown-assets-while-pen-testing/ External Attack Surface Management (EASM) coupled with Penetration Testing as a Service (PTaaS) can help find those blind spots and hidden assets exposed on your network. Learn more from Outpost24 about how combining EASM and PTaaS can help reveal these hidden pitfalls. [...]
